name: IB_RSH_MSG
description: The IB_RSH_MSG table contains information about the Research IDs that are included with an In Basket message.

columns.name: MSG_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the task record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: RESEARCH_ID
columns.description: The research studies associated with the message. It may be set for messages used in research workflows.
